org.cpsolver.studentsct.reservation

Class CourseRestriction

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cpsolver.studentsct.reservation.Restriction
      • org.cpsolver.studentsct.reservation.CourseRestriction

  • public class CourseRestriction
extends Restriction
    Group restriction. Students are matched based on their course requests.

    Version:
    StudentSct 1.3 (Student Sectioning)
